about.title: What I am all about
paragraph: Web and mobile applications based on Javascript frameworks Frontend Developer. Expertise building interfaces from scratch and/or PSD to HTML mockups, letting user experiences with all features according project requeriments.

Expertise with Project Leadership, so I am able to take decision-making attitude when necessary.
SCRUM as main agile methodology.
Use of modern tools for fast solutions development. Resources investigation and deployment for incremental code-source enhancement.

paragraph.description: Continuous improvements deployment prioritizing security and performance around each development stages.
Decision making attitude and leadership role in small and middle scope projects.
Investigation and good practices as main aspects to develop high quality products.
Interfaces and user experiences development based on the most recent web responsive design standards.
Rapid deployment of ideas and solutions using Parallel Thinking concepts.

paragraph.title: CSS and preproccesors (SCSS, SASS, LESS, Mixin)

Reading inspires, and inspiration leads to improved creativity and strategy levels for problem solving.
A good cup of coffee motivate you to create quality code, it is the fuel of the developer.
A healthy and funny hobby is reading the heroic ideas of the late Stan Lee.
When a framework begins to be noticed, curiosity makes its appearance; evaluation is important.
Especially strategy and MMORPG games, they are an incentive to denote healthy competitiveness, something important in the work environment.
